description: Analyzes combat-related commands in the game

confidence_guidelines.0.0: Command is not related to combat or completely unclear
confidence_guidelines.0.3: Command might be related to combat but very ambiguous
confidence_guidelines.0.5: Command is likely about combat but target/action is unclear
confidence_guidelines.0.7: Command is clearly about combat but might have additional context
confidence_guidelines.0.9: Command is definitely about combat with clear target and action
